divs: sighting details1. outside country home with no outdoor lights on smoking a cig. 2. i always leave the lights off so i can look at the stars and find satellites and stuff. 3. at first a bright star, or a satellite 4. i was star like, then got really bright (as if lighting its engines?..im not sure really) then the light seemed to be getting further away untill the light\star disapeared. 5. i called my wife to see and she saw the light get bright and disappear as well 6. it seemed to get to far away
Summary: Looked like bright star in space, then got extremely bright, then disappeared as if gettin farther away
trends: There has been one other sighting in Wetaskiwin
There were no other sightings in Wetaskiwin on or around September 21st 2005
